title: Custom watch face for Android Wear
summary: Custom watch face is a highly customizable tool for creating your own watch face
description: Custom watch face for Android™ wear is a highly customizable tool for creating your own watch face, it provides a lot of configuration options, several of the custom options available are shown below:• The ability to display a color gradient• The ability to set a specific text color/text size/stroke width/padding size/length for each item on your watch• Customizable background color and able to set your own photos• Text customizations (Custom typeface/Flat long shadows /Drop shadows/Glow)• Animated tick marks, animated text and the ability to smooth second hand• Radar effect• Sub Dial Second • Customizable ambient mode• Use your own clock hands (choose from your local storage)• Step count• Battery level indicator• Unread SMS and missed calls count• Weather condition and temperature(auto detect or select the locations where you want)• Many pre-designed themes and clock hands• Design for both round and square watches• More features coming soon!Installation1. Go to Android Wear App - Watch faces - Select this watch face2. Configuration: Press on the setting icon on top of the watch face3. Tap the present theme twice if it doesn't work properly.Please enable both GPS (only works outdoors) and the Network Location Provider (works indoors and outdoors) to improve location accuracy.Be sure to run the Watch Face configuration during first run of the app after installation! Please note that,  you must have an Android Wear device and the Android Wear App (developed by Google) to get watch faces worked.Privacy Policyhttps://sites.google.com/site/customwatchfaceprivacypolicy/Credits* Android™ is a trademark of Google Inc.* Weather data from OpenWeatherMap.* ColorPicker by QuadFlask.* Picasso by Square.
descriptionHTML:
Custom watch face for Android™ wear is a highly customizable tool for creating your own watch face, it provides a lot of configuration options, several of the custom options available are shown below:
• The ability to display a color gradient
• The ability to set a specific text color/text size/stroke width/padding size/length for each item on your watch
• Customizable background color and able to set your own photos
• Text customizations (Custom typeface/Flat long shadows /Drop shadows/Glow)
• Animated tick marks, animated text and the ability to smooth second hand
• Radar effect
• Sub Dial Second
• Customizable ambient mode
• Use your own clock hands (choose from your local storage)
• Step count
• Battery level indicator
• Unread SMS and missed calls count
• Weather condition and temperature(auto detect or select the locations where you want)
• Many pre-designed themes and clock hands
• Design for both round and square watches
• More features coming soon!

Installation
1. Go to Android Wear App - Watch faces - Select this watch face
2. Configuration: Press on the setting icon on top of the watch face
3. Tap the present theme twice if it doesn't work properly.

Please enable both GPS (only works outdoors) and the Network Location Provider (works indoors and outdoors) to improve location accuracy.
Be sure to run the Watch Face configuration during first run of the app after installation!
Please note that, you must have an Android Wear device and the Android Wear App (developed by Google) to get watch faces worked.
Privacy Policy
https://sites.google.com/site/customwatchfaceprivacypolicy/
Credits
* Android™ is a trademark of Google Inc.
* Weather data from OpenWeatherMap.
* ColorPicker by QuadFlask.
* Picasso by Square.
comments: absolutely love the updates, mmmore watch faces pls))
recentChanges: - improvements to battery life as well as a few bug fixes
- (new) The ability to customize the length of watch hand
